title: Disgusting FPS makes game unplayable... Do I just have a toaster?
body:
The past 5 games I have played so far have tilted me off the face of the earth because I cant dodge any skillshots if I have 20> FPS. I have already made the game have minecraft graphics, and have done the whole "Power settings" and "Opitmize for performance" tricks. What do you suggest I do?
Do I just have a toaster?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Oh no!  :(  I'd like to help, and hopefully bring you back into orbit.  Frame drops can happen for a variety of reasons, like bad game files or drivers too.  You've gone over some solid steps, but I suggest also going through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  This will help rule out possibilities as well as tune up your PC.  Just be sure to test it in a custom to prevent any potential penalties or more stress!  I hope that helps!
